Description: Selling my showroom-new Hamer tobacco sunburst. The USA Studio is Hamer's top of the line guitar, crafted from pattern grade Honduras mahogany and topped with figured maple. Hamer is known for rich, dark tones in the Les Paul neighborhood, but many think they sound even better. This exceptional instrument has been a case queen since I bought it new. Played it a total of maybe 3 hours and it's never even been out of the house. Professionally set up, the action is low and fast, the intonation perfect. A few of the artists who play/played Hamers:Aerosmith -- Brad Whitford Bad Company -- Mick Ralphs Bad Company -- Boz Burrell Blues Brothers -- John Belushi Blues Brothers -- Matt Murphy Roy Buchanan -- Roy Buchanan Cheap Trick -- Rick Nielsen Cheap Trick -- Tom PeterssonCheap Trick -- Robin Zander Dire Straits -- Mark Knopfler Eagles -- Joe Walsh Hall & Oates -- Daryl Hall Jethro Tull -- Ian AndersonJethro Tull -- Martin BarreKiss -- Paul Stanley Nick Lowe -- Nick Lowe Molly Hatchet -- Dave Hlubek The Police -- Andy Summers The Ramones -- Johnny RamoneThe Rolling Stones -- Keith RichardsThe Rolling Stones -- Ron Wood The Who -- Pete Townshend
Title: Hamer USA Studio GATSSO 1990's Electric Guitar
